title: Strengthening Nursing Practice Competencies: Integrated Design-Based Traffic Signal Phase Optimization Practical Training

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can implement simulation models for traffic signal phase design processes across three or more intersections
Learners analyze traffic signal controller hardware specifications and configure interface circuits according to electronic circuit design principles
Learners implement traffic control algorithms using object-oriented programming (OOP) and perform team-based debugging
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
